text: Boris Pistorius (; born 14 March 1960) is a German lawyer and politician of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD). He has been the Federal Minister of Defence since 19 January 2023. He was in the State Parliament of Lower Saxony from 2017, until his appointment as Federal Minister in 2023. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Defence ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from Lower Saxony Category:German lawyers Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Boris Pistorius
